name: Stickman Trampoline PRO - Extreme Flip Action!
name_original: Stickman Trampoline PRO - Extreme Flip Action!
description:
**OVER 2 MILLION DOWNLOADS!**

#1 Game in 20+ Countries!

Do you have what it takes to master the insane heights & flip combos of the trampoline?

***** - "Awesome - This game is amazing" - by Cademan42
***** "This game is so good but warning it's so addictive" - by Jdjxudjjfkd

Stickman Trampoline will provide you with hours of fun as you top GameCenter Leaderboards and land jumps like a Stickman Champ!

This PRO version has no ads, plus exclusive Challenge Mode!

Features:

- Addictive gameplay with pick-up-and-play simplicity
- 11 unique stickman characters, each with their own physics - can you master them all?
- 10 themes to jump in - classic, moonlight, gym, island, and winter themes
- Earn coins with high scores and by completing achievements
- Challenge your friends & try to be on top of the worldwide leaderboards!

If you're a fan of any other Stickman style games, Stickman Trampoline is a must-have!

DOWNLOAD THIS AMAZING GAME NOW!

Please feel free to contact us with your feedback or suggestions at info@theappward.com. We love to hear from you!
